channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Security (Consumer)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Security (Consumer)

item.title: CVE-2022-30703|2024-08-03T06:56:13.820Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20security%20%28consumer%29
item.description: Trend Micro Security 2021 and 2022 (Consumer) is vulnerable to an exposed dangerous method vulnerability that could allow an attacker to obtain access to leaked kernel addresses and disclose sensitive information. This vulnerability could also potentially be chained for privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2022-30702|2024-08-03T06:56:13.714Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20security%20%28consumer%29
item.description: Trend Micro Security 2022 and 2021 (Consumer) is vulnerable to an Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure vulnerability that could allow an attacker to disclose sensitive information on an affected machine.
